subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Well Armed won the $6 million Dubai World Cup on Saturday to claim the richest prize in horse racing. The 6-year-old Well Armed, trained by Eoin Harty and ridden by Aaron Gryder, ran away from the 14-horse field. Gloria de Campeao was a distant second, and the favorite Albertus Maximus was back in the pack and never challenged for the lead in the 1.25-mile World Cup.
